pullRequest.title: #2693 Refactor samples & executable client utilities into separate modules
pullRequest.bodyText:
Signed-off-by: Nigel Jones nigel.l.jones+git@gmail.com
This PR aims to
a) Refactor design model archives module into 3 distinct modules - base, cim, cgm
b) Add build of executable utilities for both models
b2) test utilities/make any required code changes to classes/packages.
c) Add utilities to packaging
d) Run creation offline & Add Cloud Information model (and packaging)
e) update READMEs
So far I have done an initial change for a). I am opening this as a draft PR to enable rapid feedback. Meanwhile I'll progress the other changes & push updates as ready.
The refactoring was desirable as we have 2 very distinct capabilities in the same module. They are used differently too. Both utility classes have main() and common practice is one top level jar per maven module.
This initial commit builds cleanly, but I have not tested runtime yet. (I've left the jena runtime dependency in-place for the cgm)
cc: @davidradl @mandy-chessell - I expect you'll only see a formal review once I move to ready state. But early feedback on the refactor is welcome.

nodes.bodyText: why are the admin servers samples a child of the access services samples. I would assume the admin services amples do not call the omas APIs.
This name does not look right . The name seems to be that of the parent.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,125 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+
+<!-- SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 -->
+<!-- Copyright Contributors to the ODPi Egeria project. -->

+<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0"
+         xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
+         xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
+
+    <parent>
+        <artifactId>design-model-archives</artifactId>
+        <groupId>org.odpi.egeria</groupId>
+        <version>1.8-SNAPSHOT</version>
+    </parent>
+
+    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
+
+    <scm>
+        <connection>scm:git:git://github.com/odpi/egeria.git</connection>
+        <developerConnection>scm:git:ssh://github.com/odpi/egeria.git</developerConnection>
+        <url>http://github.com/odpi/egeria/tree/master</url>
+    </scm>
+
+    <name>Design Model Archives</name>

nodes.bodyText: Description is that of the parent
